text.value: NA (for children under three years old)
Section 2: Awareness on Chikungunya, Dengue and Rift Valley Fever
Section 2: Awareness on Chikungunya, Dengue and Rift Valley Fever
6. Please, mention at least 5 human diseases that are transmitted by mosquitoes
Other human diseases that are transmitted by mosquitoes
7. Are you aware of any of the following diseases: If No; skip to section
Section 2: Awareness on Chikungunya, Dengue and Rift Valley Fever
8. Please mention signs and symptoms of Chikungunya in humans
Other signs and symptoms of Chikungunya
9. Please mention signs and symptoms of Dengue in humans
Other signs and symptoms of Dengue
10. Please mention signs and symptoms of Rift Valley fever in humans
Other signs and symptoms of RVF
11. Of the three diseases (Dengue, Chikungunya and Rift Valley fever), which ones may affect animals?
Section 3: Non-animal exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
15. Has your home area ever flooded in the past
Section 3: Non-animal exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
16. If Yes to Qn 18; when was it flooded?
17. Do you have water-holding containers at your home?
Yes both inside and outside house
18. Mention mosquito breeding environment that you know
Other mosquito breeding environment that you know
19. What are the main agricultural practices that provide permissive environment for mosquito breeding?
Other main agricultural practices that provide permissive environment for mosquito breeding?
Section 3: Non-animal exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
20. Are the following activities conducted in your area?
21. Are the following available at your homestedy?
flower beds that can hold up water
22.Have you ever experienced upsurge in mosquito populations in an area where you live?
23. How frequently do you use mosquito net
24. Did you sleep under mosquito net last night?
25. Do you use other forms of mosquito control?
Please specify other forms of mosquito control
26. Do you experience mosquito bites while living in this area?
27. If yes to above Qn, how often
28. Have you had any personal illness with fever in the past three months?
Section 4: Animal Exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
29. Do you keep animals within the house you sleep
Section 4: Animal Exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
30. If yes to above Qn; which animals
Adult: One year and above , Young: Below one year
Section 4: Animal Exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
31. Do you herd animals to grazing?
32. Have you ever participated in slaughtering of animal?
33. If yes to above Qn; when did you participate slaughtering an animal
34. If yes to above Qn. ; which animal did you slaughter
Other animals which you did slaughter
Section 4: Animal Exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
35. If ever participated in slaughtering of animal; what role did you play during slaughtering?
Bleeding out (separating the neck from main body)
Removing the offal/viscera of the animal
Clean the carcass, offal and/ or visceral
Other role played during slaughtering animal
36. Was the post-mortem inspection made by the Veterinary Officer before the meat was consumed/sold out?
37. When did you last consume meat from dead animal
38. If yes to Qn. above ; what was the source of dead meat that you consumed?
Other source of dead meat consumed
39. When did you last milk an animal?
40. If yes to Qn. above; which animal did you milk?
41. When did you last consume raw animal blood
42. If yes to Qn. above; from which animal was the blood you consumed?
Other animal which blood was consumed
43. When did you care for an animal giving birth
44. If yes to Qn. above; which animal did you care for birthing?
Other animal which did you care for birthing?
45. When did you handle/dispose an animal foetus?
46. If yes to Qn above; which animal foetus did you handle/dispose?
Other animal which foetus did you handle/dispose?
47. What do you normally do when your animal dies?
Dispose the cadaver in a pit
What other activities do you normally do when your animal dies?
48. ID. of the human blood sample
Uelewa kuhusu Chikungunya, Dengi, na Homa ya Bonde la Ufa
Uelewa kuhusu Chikungunya, Dengi, na Homa ya Bonde la Ufa
6. Kama jibu ni NDIYO, nitajie angalao magonjwa 5 ya binadamu yanayoambukizwa na mbu
Magonjwa mengine ya binadamu yanayoambukizwa na mbu
7. Je unafahamu ugonjwa wowote kati ya haya yafuatayo
Uelewa kuhusu Chikungunya, Dengi, na Homa ya Bonde la Ufa
8. Nitajie dalili za Chikungunya kwa binadamu
Dalili zingine za Chikungunya kwa binadamu
9. Nitajie dalili za Dengi kwa binadamu
Dalili zingine za dengi kwa binadamu
10. Nitajie dalili za Homaya Bonde la Ufa kwa binadamu
Dalili zingine za homa ya bonde la ufa kwa binadamu
Section 3: Non-animal exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
15. je, mafuriko yaliwahi kutokea maeneo ya nyumbani kwako?
Section 3: Non-animal exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
16. Kama ndiyo, ni lini mafuriko yalitokea?
17. Je katika eneo la nyumbani kwako kuna vyombo vinavyoruhusu kutuama kwa maji?
Ndio ndani na nje ya nyumba
18. Je unatambua mazalio ya mbu? Nitajie baadhi ya mazalia ya mbu unayoyafahamu
mazalio mengine ya mbu? Nitajie baadhi ya mazalia ya mbu unayoyafahamu
19. Je, ni shughuli zipi za kilimo zinazochangia uwepo wa mazalia ya mbu
shughuli zingine zipi za kilimo zinazochangia uwepo wa mazalia ya mbu
Section 3: Non-animal exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
20. Je, shughuli zifuatazo hufanyika katika eneo lako?
21. Je, vitu vifuatavyo vinapatikana maeneo ya nyumbani mwako
flower beds that can hold up water
22. Je, uliwahi kushuhudia ongezeko kubwa la mbu katika eneo unaloishi?
23. Je ni kwa kiasi gani hutumia chandarua cha kujikinga na mbu?
24. Je, ulilala ndani ya chandarua usiku uliopita?
25. Je, huwa unatumia njia yoyote nyingine ya kujikinga na mbu?
Tafadhali elezea njia nyingine ya kujikinga na mbu
26. Je, huwa unaumwa na mbu katika eneo unaloishi?
27. Kama ndiyo, ni kwa kiasi gani huwa unaumwa na mbu?
28. Je, uliwahi kupata homa katika kipindi cha miezi mitatu iliyopoita
Section 4: Animal Exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
29. Je, unafuga mifugo ndani ya nyumba unayoishi?
Section 4: Animal Exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
30. Kama ndiyo; je unafuga wanyama gani ndani ya nyumba unayoishi?)
Section 4: Animal Exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
33. Kama ndiyo; ni lini ulishiriki kuchinja mnyama?
34. Kama ndiyo; ni wanyama wapi ulichinja?
Section 4: Animal Exposure (Parents/guardians to respond for children below seven years old)
35. Endapo ulishashiriki kuchinja mnyama; Je,ni shughuli ipi ulifanya kati ya zifuatazo?
Bleeding out (separating the neck from main body)
Removing the offal/viscera of the animal
Clean the carcass, offal and/ or visceral
Shughuli ingine uliofanya wakati wakuchinja mnyama
36. Kama ndiyo; je nyama ilikaguliwa na mtaalamu wa mifugo kable ya kuliwa/kuuzwa?
37. Je ni lini ulikula nyama ya mnyama aliyekufa?
38. Kama ndiyo; Je ulikula nyama ya mnyama yupi?
39. Je ni lini ulikamua maziwa kwa mnyama kwa mara ya mwisho
40. Kama ndiyo; je ulikamua maziwa ya mnyama yupi?
41. Je ni lini kwa mara ya mwisho ulikunywa damu mbichi?
42. Kama ndiyo; Je ulikunywa damu ya mnyama gani?)
Other animal which blood was consumed
43. Je ni lini ulimsadia mnyama wakati wa kuzaa?
44. Kama ndiyo, ni mnyama yupi ulimsaidia wakati wa kuzaa?
Other animal which did you care for birthing?
45. Je, ni lini ulishika ama ulizika mzoga wa mimba iliyotupwa na mnyama?
46. Kama ndiyo; ulikuwa mzoga wa mnyama yupi?
Other animal which foetus did you handle/dispose?
47. Je, huwa mnafanya nini endapo mnyama wako atakufa?
Dispose the cadaver in a pit
What other activities do you normally do when your animal dies?
